definition: aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: His writings had been translated into various languages.
sentences.chinese: 他的著作已被譯成幾種文字。

sentences.english: But in fact it was McEwan's funniest novel for years.
sentences.chinese: 但是事實上這是他數年來最爲風趣的一本著作。

sentences.english: The most notable legal treatise in the century is Littleton's Tenures .
sentences.chinese: 該世紀最著名的法學著作是利特力頓的《土地使用》。

sentences.english: Marx and Engels's system of division of labour is multileveled.
sentences.chinese: 馬恩著作中的分工是一個包含多層次的分工體系。

sentences.english: Work in this area in recent years have published a total of about 20 kinds.
sentences.chinese: 近幾年來又有這方面的著作出版，共計約20餘種。

sentences.english: In the case of non-Euclidean geometry he published no definitive work.
sentences.chinese: 至於非歐幾里德幾何，他沒有發表過權威性的著作。

sentences.english: Because of his writings, professor Yang Qi has won national and ministerial awards several times.
sentences.chinese: 楊起教授著作多次獲國家級與部級獎勵。

sentences.english: Those who have argued that this idea arose from a mistranslation of Marx and Engels's works are mistaken.
sentences.chinese: 那些主張這種觀點是對馬恩著作的誤譯的人是錯誤的。

sentences.english: Turn off the TV and read great books. They open doors in your brain.
sentences.chinese: 關掉電視，閱讀偉大的著作，它會開啓你的智慧之門。

sentences.english: Software copyright holders must pay a registration fee according to the rules.
sentences.chinese: 軟件著作權人還應當按規定交納登記費。

sentences.english: In the works of Confucius, afterlife, ghost and deity were seldom mentioned.
sentences.chinese: 在孔子的著作中很少提及來世和鬼神。

sentences.english: The polygamous organization of families is a focus of Becker’s book.
sentences.chinese: 貝克爾著作的關注之一就是家庭的多偶制結構。

sentences.english: The book, The Chronicle of Chen Yuan′s Life with Illustration is a seriously written work with academic value.
sentences.chinese: 《陳垣年譜配圖長編》是一部嚴謹有加的學術著作。

sentences.english: Yilin Gaicuo(Correction on the Errors of Medical Works)is a work of WANG Qing-ren in Qing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 《醫林改錯》是清代醫家王清任的著作。

sentences.english: He subtitled his work with To Lady Carvier.
sentences.chinese: 他爲他的著作加上小標題爲“獻給卡里爾夫人”。

sentences.english: It was to protect such specific moral products of human creativity that the Copyright Law is legislated.
sentences.chinese: 著作權法正是爲保護這種特殊的精神產品而存在。

definition: a series of books/a collection of books
to compose (a piece of writing)/to write/(written) work/writer
